attributes.action: Business access only down alley way in between Primark and HSBC
attributes.additional_details: The alley way smells of urine and is able to be smelt back on the front of the shops towards the stonebow. People’s health is at risk with needles littered and violent people down there.
attributes.background: We want business access only down this alleyway. Drug use and homelessness is becoming dangerous for people down there.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
